祁奚.definition: Qi Xi (c. 620-550 BC), minister of Jin state 晉國|晋国[Jin4 guo2] of the Spring and Autumn states

祁奚之薦.definition: Qi Xi's recommendation (idiom); recommending the best person for the job independent of factional loyalty

祁東.definition: Qidong county in Hengyang 衡陽|衡阳[Heng2 yang2], Hunan

祁東縣.definition: Qidong county in Hengyang 衡陽|衡阳[Heng2 yang2], Hunan

祁縣.definition: Qi County in Jinzhong 晉中|晋中[Jin4 zhong1], Shanxi

祁連.definition: Qilian County in Haibei Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture 海北藏族自治州[Hai3 bei3 Zang4 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Qinghai

祁連山脈.definition: Qilian Mountains (formerly Richthofen Range), dividing Qinghai and Gansu provinces

祁連縣.definition: Qilian County in Haibei Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture 海北藏族自治州[Hai3 bei3 Zang4 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Qinghai

祁門.definition: Qimen, a county in Huangshan 黃山|黄山[Huang2shan1], Anhui
